scripts.update-types: eval $(grep '^SUPABASE_PRODUCTION_PROJECT_ID' .env) && supabase gen types --lang=typescript --project-id "$SUPABASE_PRODUCTION_PROJECT_ID" --schema public > src/types.ts
scripts.sync:data: supabase db dump --data-only -f supabase/seed.sql -s public && supabase db reset
scripts.backup:local: PGPASSWORD='postgres' pg_dump -h localhost -p 54322 -U postgres -d postgres --data-only -t public.profiles -t  public.comments -t public.wishlists -t public.memos -f supabase/local_backup.sql --inserts && supabase db dump --local --data-only -f supabase/seed_auth.sql -s auth
scripts.sync:schema: supabase db diff -f local_schema && supabase db push
